main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Pueblo, Colorado in May 1956, with descriptions of bright, rapidly descending objects and strange lights in the sky for six successive nights. The sightings involved observations of round, fast-moving objects of various sizes and colors.
interesting points: Various witnesses reported seeing bright, rapidly descending objects as well as strange lights in the sky over Pueblo, Colorado for six successive nights in May 1956.
The objects were described as round, varying in size from the size of a baseball to that of a basketball, and having colors ranging from white to grey.
One report mentioned an inverted bowl-shaped transparent object estimated to be 50 to 80 feet in size, seen through binoculars of unknown type.
The Air Force made efforts to investigate the sightings and sent teams to Pueblo, but no conclusive findings were reported.

The conclusions of the investigation indicated that the sightings were possibly balloons or of insufficient data for evaluation, and that the presence of multiple balloon numbers was observed at the time of one of the sightings.
sighted object: bright, rapidly descending objects and strange lights in the sky
photographs: no the report does not include photographs
